data.title: Poornima Research Group
data.text:
PhD in Biomedical and Chemical Engineering has been approved by NYS! Accepting applicants since Fall 2021.

Currently, we have two graduate students in the Microsystems Engineering PhD program and several undergraduates/accelerated degrees working in the group enrolled for independent study or project credit. Openings are available for a motivated graduate student, in the fields of Math Modeling, Microsystems Engineering, or Biomedical and Chemical Engineering. Please contact Dr. Poornima Padmanabhan directly if interested.
